p: ST, MDu, J-FC, MV-T, SMou, and ME designed and conceived the study. ST, DC, EDu, MDu, EDe, MDe, LY, and LG performed the experiments. ST and TB performed the bioinformatics analyses. MDe, SJ, AK, KC, J-FC, MV-T, and SMor realized fieldwork in Thailand. ST wrote the manuscript. ST, DC, TB, SP, MDu, SMor, SMou, MDe, and ME reviewed the manuscript.
